description: Reads the update history from the JSON 'result_file'.

result_file.description: Log file for patching results. This file will contain the JSON output that is returned from these tasks. This is data that was written by patching::update. If no script name is passed on Linux hosts a default is used: /var/log/patching.json. If no script name is passed  on Windows hosts a default is used: C:/ProgramData/PuppetLabs/patching/patching.json
